permafrost.tundra.server

Class SystemHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.SystemHelper

  • public final class SystemHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with the webMethods Integration Server system.

      • reflect

        public static com.wm.data.IData reflect(boolean refresh)
                                 throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns information about Integration Server such as the software version, environment settings, Java properties, well-known directory locations, and memory usage.
        Parameters:
        refresh - If true, the returned IData will be rebuilt from the system environment and properties to reflect any changes that have occurred.
        Returns:
        Integration Server properties.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs.
